page.title: 15HOME LIFE
page.content: {1ELECTRICAL APPLIANCES}- IN USE BY PARENTS OF CHILDREN IN CLASS 2 {Washing machines - 20 Radio - 20 {Television - 20 Refrigerator - 19 Freezer - 18 Tumble dryers - 16 Stereo systems - 12 Video - 7 Computers - 6 Microwave - 2 This survey is taken from a group of 20 children. {TELEPHONES -}WHOLE SCHOOL Class 1: l3 out of 17 have telephones Class 2: 13 out of 22 have telephones Class 3: 19 out of 29 have telephones Class 4: 11 out of 15 have telephones Therefore 56 out of 83 children in the School have telephones.
